MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY19 postcode area of Llanbrynmair, affecting properties in Bont Dolgadfan and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.38AM. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.49PM on 28th March 2021.
